law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"County commissioners" means the Board of County Commissioners of Queen Anne's County.

"Permit" means:
a multiple gaming device permit issued under § 13-2003 of this subtitle; or
a raffle permit issued under § 13-2004 of this subtitle.

section.section: "Raffle" means a lottery in which a prize is won by a person who buys a paper chance.
A "raffle" is not a multiple gaming device regulated under § 13-2003 of this subtitle unless run in conjunction with an event that requires a multiple gaming device permit.
